p:
Volatiles in 3.0 g of PKO were extracted and concentrated using headspace (HS)-solid phase microextraction (SPME) at 60 °C for 40 min and analyzed by gas chromatography (GC) coupled to flame ionization detector (FID) and mass spectrometer (MS) (Agilent, CA, USA). Methods for separation and identification of volatile compounds were the same as described in Zhang et al.
4 .
